2025-08-10 15:16:35
Code Execution - Plan #3 (Iteration 3)
Executing development phase code:
Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key is None: print("Error: Missing API key. Make sure you have SERPAPI_API_KEY in your environment variables.") else: print("API key found, proceeding with London City Airport energy harvesting search...") print("Searching for London City Airport expansion proposals with energy harvesting infrastructure") print("=" * 80) # Define comprehensive search queries targeting London City Airport energy harvesting proposals search_queries = [ 'London City Airport energy harvesting expansion proposal', 'London City Airport microgrid energy harvesting submission', 'London City Airport planning application energy infrastructure rejected', '"London City Airport" energy harvesting tiles expansion planning', 'London City Airport renewable energy infrastructure proposal assessment', 'Newham Council London City Airport energy harvesting planning application', 'Planning Inspectorate London City Airport energy infrastructure submission', 'London City Airport expansion energy harvesting non-shortlisted', '"London City Airport" planning permission energy harvesting rejected', 'London City Airport sustainable energy infrastructure proposal outcome', 'LCY airport energy harvesting expansion planning application', 'London City Airport microgrid planning submission timeline' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} different query strategies...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) # Prepare API request parameters params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.com", "safe": "off", "num": 15, # Get more results for comprehensive search "type": "search" } # Make API request to SerpAPI try: response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: results = response.json() if results.get("organic_results"): print(f"Found {len(results['organic_results'])} results for query {i}") # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results["organic_results"], 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet}") # Check for key indicators related to London City Airport and energy harvesting # FIXED: Define combined_text variable before using it combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" key_indicators = [ 'london city airport', 'lcy', 'energy harvesting', 'microgrid', 'planning application', 'expansion', 'rejected', 'non-shortlisted', 'newham council', 'planning inspectorate', 'assessment outcome', 'submission timeline', 'energy infrastructure', 'renewable energy', 'sustainable energy', 'planning permission' ] matching_indicators = [indicator for indicator in key_indicators if indicator in combined_text] if len(matching_indicators) >= 4: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - Contains {len(matching_indicators)} key indicators: {matching_indicators}") elif len(matching_indicators) >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - Contains {len(matching_indicators)} indicators: {matching_indicators}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with query info all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_indicators': matching_indicators, 'relevance_score': len(matching_indicators) }) else: print(f"No organic results found for query {i}: '{query}'") else: print(f"Error: API request failed with status {response.status_code}: {response.text}") except Exception as e: print(f"Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for further analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/london_city_airport_energy_harvesting_search_results_{timestamp}.json' # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find London City Airport expansion proposals with energy harvesting infrastructure and their assessment outcomes', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nSEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['relevance_score'] >= 4] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['relevance_score'] >= 2 and r['relevance_score'] < 4] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (4+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results: print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet']}") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") print(f"Matching indicators: {result['matching_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2-3 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:10]: # Show top 10 medium relevance print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['matching_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) # Look for specific planning authority mentions print(f"\n\nPLANNING AUTHORITY ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) planning_authorities = {} authorities = ['newham council', 'planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'civil aviation authority'] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for authority in authorities: if authority in combined_text: if authority not in planning_authorities: planning_authorities[authority] = [] planning_authorities[authority].append(result) print(f"Planning authorities mentioned in search results:") for authority, mentions in planning_authorities.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} mentions") if mentions: print(f" Top mention: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Look for timeline and assessment outcome indicators print(f"\n\nTIMELINE AND ASSESSMENT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) timeline_indicators = ['submitted', 'application', 'rejected', 'approved', 'assessment', 'outcome', 'decision'] timeline_results = [] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" found_timeline_indicators = [indicator for indicator in timeline_indicators if indicator in combined_text] if found_timeline_indicators: timeline_results.append({ 'result': result, 'timeline_indicators': found_timeline_indicators }) print(f"Results with timeline/assessment indicators: {len(timeline_results)}") for item in timeline_results[:5]: # Show top 5 result = item['result'] print(f"\nüìÖ TIMELINE RESULT:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Timeline indicators: {item['timeline_indicators']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") # Look for energy harvesting specific terms print(f"\n\nENERGY HARVESTING SPECIFIC ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) energy_terms = ['energy harvesting', 'microgrid', 'solar panels', 'renewable energy', 'sustainable energy', 'energy infrastructure', 'photovoltaic', 'solar pv', 'combined heat and power', 'chp'] energy_results = [] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" found_energy_terms = [term for term in energy_terms if term in combined_text] if found_energy_terms: energy_results.append({ 'result': result, 'energy_terms': found_energy_terms }) print(f"Results with energy harvesting/infrastructure terms: {len(energy_results)}") for item in energy_results[:8]: # Show top 8 result = item['result'] print(f"\n‚ö° ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE RESULT:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Energy terms: {item['energy_terms']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nSearch phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific London City Airport energy harvesting proposals and their outcomes.") # Key findings summary print(f"\n\nüîç KEY FINDINGS SUMMARY:") print("=" * 50) # Count results by type microgrid_results = [r for r in all_results if 'microgrid' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] rejected_results = [r for r in all_results if 'rejected' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] planning_results = [r for r in all_results if 'planning' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] print(f"Results mentioning microgrid: {len(microgrid_results)}") print(f"Results mentioning rejected applications: {len(rejected_results)}") print(f"Results mentioning planning applications: {len(planning_results)}") if microgrid_results: print(f"\nüîã TOP MICROGRID FINDINGS:") for result in microgrid_results[:3]: print(f"- {result['title']}") print(f" {result['snippet'][:100]}...") if rejected_results: print(f"\n‚ùå TOP REJECTED APPLICATION FINDINGS:") for result in rejected_results[:3]: print(f"- {result['title']}") print(f" {result['snippet'][:100]}...") print(f"\n‚úÖ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH COMPLETED") print(f"Files created:") print(f"- {results_file}") # Final assessment print(f"\nüìä FINAL ASSESSMENT:") print(f"Based on the search results, London City Airport has:") print(f"1. Active microgrid development projects (confirmed)") print(f"2. Planning applications that were initially rejected by Newham Council") print(f"3. Energy infrastructure components including solar PV and CHP") print(f"4. Sustainability commitments and net-zero carbon goals") print(f"\nHowever, no specific evidence found of 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted.") print(f"The microgrid projects appear to be approved and under development, not rejected.")

Execution successful - Code ran without errors and completed the comprehensive search for London City Airport energy harvesting expansion proposals. The search executed 12 targeted queries and collected 173 results, successfully identifying key findings: (1) London City Airport has active microgrid development projects combining solar PV, CHP, and energy infrastructure that are approved and under development, (2) Planning applications were initially rejected by Newham Council in July 2023 but later approved on appeal by the government in August 2024, (3) Found 2 high-relevance results confirming the rejection and appeal process, 78 medium-relevance results, and specific mentions of planning authorities (Newham Council: 7 mentions, Planning Inspectorate: 5 mentions). However, the search found no specific evidence of 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted as originally hypothesized. The microgrid projects appear to be approved infrastructure rather than rejected energy harvesting proposals. PLAN alignment: 95% - successfully investigated London City Airport and determined it has energy infrastructure projects but not the specific non-shortlisted energy harvesting tiles scenario. The comprehensive results are saved to workspace files for reference. Python Code python
import os import requests import json from datetime import datetime # Get SerpAPI key from environment variables api_key = os.getenv("SERPAPI_API_KEY") if api_key is None: print("Error: Missing API key. Make sure you have SERPAPI_API_KEY in your environment variables.") else: print("API key found, proceeding with London City Airport energy harvesting search...") print("Searching for London City Airport expansion proposals with energy harvesting infrastructure") print("=" * 80) # Define comprehensive search queries targeting London City Airport energy harvesting proposals search_queries = [ 'London City Airport energy harvesting expansion proposal', 'London City Airport microgrid energy harvesting submission', 'London City Airport planning application energy infrastructure rejected', '"London City Airport" energy harvesting tiles expansion planning', 'London City Airport renewable energy infrastructure proposal assessment', 'Newham Council London City Airport energy harvesting planning application', 'Planning Inspectorate London City Airport energy infrastructure submission', 'London City Airport expansion energy harvesting non-shortlisted', '"London City Airport" planning permission energy harvesting rejected', 'London City Airport sustainable energy infrastructure proposal outcome', 'LCY airport energy harvesting expansion planning application', 'London City Airport microgrid planning submission timeline' ] print(f"Starting comprehensive search with {len(search_queries)} different query strategies...") print("=" * 80) # Store all search results all_results = [] # Perform searches with different queries for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\nSearch {i}/{len(search_queries)}: {query}") print("-" * 60) # Prepare API request parameters params = { "q": query, "api_key": api_key, "engine": "google", "google_domain": "google.com", "safe": "off", "num": 15, # Get more results for comprehensive search "type": "search" } # Make API request to SerpAPI try: response = requests.get("https://serpapi.com/search.json", params=params, timeout=30) if response.status_code == 200: results = response.json() if results.get("organic_results"): print(f"Found {len(results['organic_results'])} results for query {i}") # Process and display results for j, result in enumerate(results["organic_results"], 1): title = result.get('title', 'No title') link = result.get('link', 'No link') snippet = result.get('snippet', 'No snippet') print(f"\nResult {j}:") print(f"Title: {title}") print(f"Link: {link}") print(f"Snippet: {snippet}") # Check for key indicators related to London City Airport and energy harvesting # FIXED: Define combined_text variable before using it combined_text = f"{title.lower()} {snippet.lower()}" key_indicators = [ 'london city airport', 'lcy', 'energy harvesting', 'microgrid', 'planning application', 'expansion', 'rejected', 'non-shortlisted', 'newham council', 'planning inspectorate', 'assessment outcome', 'submission timeline', 'energy infrastructure', 'renewable energy', 'sustainable energy', 'planning permission' ] matching_indicators = [indicator for indicator in key_indicators if indicator in combined_text] if len(matching_indicators) >= 4: print(f"üéØ HIGHLY RELEVANT RESULT - Contains {len(matching_indicators)} key indicators: {matching_indicators}") elif len(matching_indicators) >= 2: print(f"‚≠ê POTENTIALLY RELEVANT - Contains {len(matching_indicators)} indicators: {matching_indicators}") print("-" * 40) # Store result with query info all_results.append({ 'query_number': i, 'query_text': query, 'result_number': j, 'title': title, 'link': link, 'snippet': snippet, 'matching_indicators': matching_indicators, 'relevance_score': len(matching_indicators) }) else: print(f"No organic results found for query {i}: '{query}'") else: print(f"Error: API request failed with status {response.status_code}: {response.text}") except Exception as e: print(f"Error during search {i}: {str(e)}") print("\n" + "=" * 80) # Save all results to workspace for further analysis timestamp = datetime.now().strftime('%Y%m%d_%H%M%S') results_file = f'workspace/london_city_airport_energy_harvesting_search_results_{timestamp}.json' # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist os.makedirs('workspace', exist_ok=True) with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump({ 'search_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_purpose': 'Find London City Airport expansion proposals with energy harvesting infrastructure and their assessment outcomes', 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'total_results': len(all_results), 'queries': search_queries, 'results': all_results }, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\n\nSEARCH SUMMARY:") print(f"Total queries executed: {len(search_queries)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Results saved to: {results_file}") # Analyze results for high-relevance matches print("\n\nANALYZING RESULTS FOR HIGH-RELEVANCE MATCHES...") print("=" * 50) # Sort results by relevance score high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['relevance_score'] >= 4] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r['relevance_score'] >= 2 and r['relevance_score'] < 4] print(f"\nHigh relevance results (4+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") for result in high_relevance_results: print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE:") print(f"Query: {result['query_text']}") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet']}") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") print(f"Matching indicators: {result['matching_indicators']}") print("-" * 40) print(f"\nMedium relevance results (2-3 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") for result in medium_relevance_results[:10]: # Show top 10 medium relevance print(f"\n‚≠ê MEDIUM RELEVANCE:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:200]}...") print(f"Indicators: {result['matching_indicators']}") print("-" * 30) # Look for specific planning authority mentions print(f"\n\nPLANNING AUTHORITY ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) planning_authorities = {} authorities = ['newham council', 'planning inspectorate', 'department for transport', 'civil aviation authority'] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" for authority in authorities: if authority in combined_text: if authority not in planning_authorities: planning_authorities[authority] = [] planning_authorities[authority].append(result) print(f"Planning authorities mentioned in search results:") for authority, mentions in planning_authorities.items(): print(f" {authority.title()}: {len(mentions)} mentions") if mentions: print(f" Top mention: {mentions[0]['title'][:80]}...") # Look for timeline and assessment outcome indicators print(f"\n\nTIMELINE AND ASSESSMENT ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 40) timeline_indicators = ['submitted', 'application', 'rejected', 'approved', 'assessment', 'outcome', 'decision'] timeline_results = [] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" found_timeline_indicators = [indicator for indicator in timeline_indicators if indicator in combined_text] if found_timeline_indicators: timeline_results.append({ 'result': result, 'timeline_indicators': found_timeline_indicators }) print(f"Results with timeline/assessment indicators: {len(timeline_results)}") for item in timeline_results[:5]: # Show top 5 result = item['result'] print(f"\nüìÖ TIMELINE RESULT:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Timeline indicators: {item['timeline_indicators']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") # Look for energy harvesting specific terms print(f"\n\nENERGY HARVESTING SPECIFIC ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) energy_terms = ['energy harvesting', 'microgrid', 'solar panels', 'renewable energy', 'sustainable energy', 'energy infrastructure', 'photovoltaic', 'solar pv', 'combined heat and power', 'chp'] energy_results = [] for result in all_results: combined_text = f"{result['title'].lower()} {result['snippet'].lower()}" found_energy_terms = [term for term in energy_terms if term in combined_text] if found_energy_terms: energy_results.append({ 'result': result, 'energy_terms': found_energy_terms }) print(f"Results with energy harvesting/infrastructure terms: {len(energy_results)}") for item in energy_results[:8]: # Show top 8 result = item['result'] print(f"\n‚ö° ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE RESULT:") print(f"Title: {result['title']}") print(f"Energy terms: {item['energy_terms']}") print(f"Snippet: {result['snippet'][:150]}...") print(f"Link: {result['link']}") print("-" * 30) print(f"\nSearch phase complete. Results saved for detailed analysis.") print(f"Next step: Analyze the saved results to identify specific London City Airport energy harvesting proposals and their outcomes.") # Key findings summary print(f"\n\nüîç KEY FINDINGS SUMMARY:") print("=" * 50) # Count results by type microgrid_results = [r for r in all_results if 'microgrid' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] rejected_results = [r for r in all_results if 'rejected' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] planning_results = [r for r in all_results if 'planning' in f"{r['title'].lower()} {r['snippet'].lower()}"] print(f"Results mentioning microgrid: {len(microgrid_results)}") print(f"Results mentioning rejected applications: {len(rejected_results)}") print(f"Results mentioning planning applications: {len(planning_results)}") if microgrid_results: print(f"\nüîã TOP MICROGRID FINDINGS:") for result in microgrid_results[:3]: print(f"- {result['title']}") print(f" {result['snippet'][:100]}...") if rejected_results: print(f"\n‚ùå TOP REJECTED APPLICATION FINDINGS:") for result in rejected_results[:3]: print(f"- {result['title']}") print(f" {result['snippet'][:100]}...") print(f"\n‚úÖ COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH COMPLETED") print(f"Files created:") print(f"- {results_file}") # Final assessment print(f"\nüìä FINAL ASSESSMENT:") print(f"Based on the search results, London City Airport has:") print(f"1. Active microgrid development projects (confirmed)") print(f"2. Planning applications that were initially rejected by Newham Council") print(f"3. Energy infrastructure components including solar PV and CHP") print(f"4. Sustainability commitments and net-zero carbon goals") print(f"\nHowever, no specific evidence found of 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted.") print(f"The microgrid projects appear to be approved and under development, not rejected.")

Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime # First, let's inspect the search results file to understand its structure results_file = 'workspace/london_city_airport_energy_harvesting_search_results_20250810_151618.json' if os.path.exists(results_file): print("Found London City Airport search results file. Inspecting structure...") print("=" * 70) # Load and inspect the file structure with open(results_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) print(f"File structure:") print(f"Keys in data: {list(data.keys())}") print(f"Search timestamp: {data.get('search_timestamp', 'N/A')}") print(f"Total queries: {data.get('total_queries', 'N/A')}") print(f"Total results: {data.get('total_results', 'N/A')}") if 'results' in data and len(data['results']) > 0: print(f"\nFirst result structure:") first_result = data['results'][0] print(f"Keys in result: {list(first_result.keys())}") print("\n" + "=" * 80) print("COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS: LONDON CITY AIRPORT ENERGY HARVESTING INVESTIGATION") print("=" * 80) # Analyze the search results comprehensively all_results = data.get('results', []) print(f"\nüìä SEARCH RESULTS OVERVIEW:") print(f"Total search queries executed: {data.get('total_queries', 0)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Search purpose: {data.get('search_purpose', 'N/A')}") # Categorize results by relevance and content type high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 4] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 2 and r.get('relevance_score', 0) < 4] # Analyze energy infrastructure findings microgrid_results = [] energy_harvesting_results = [] planning_rejection_results = [] sustainability_results = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" if 'microgrid' in title_snippet: microgrid_results.append(result) if 'energy harvesting' in title_snippet or 'harvesting' in title_snippet: energy_harvesting_results.append(result) if 'rejected' in title_snippet and 'planning' in title_snippet: planning_rejection_results.append(result) if 'sustainability' in title_snippet or 'renewable energy' in title_snippet: sustainability_results.append(result) print(f"\nüîç CONTENT ANALYSIS BY CATEGORY:") print(f"High relevance results (4+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") print(f"Medium relevance results (2-3 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") print(f"Microgrid-related results: {len(microgrid_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting-related results: {len(energy_harvesting_results)}") print(f"Planning rejection results: {len(planning_rejection_results)}") print(f"Sustainability-related results: {len(sustainability_results)}") # Detailed analysis of key findings print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE FINDINGS ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) if high_relevance_results: for i, result in enumerate(high_relevance_results, 1): print(f"\nHigh Relevance Result {i}:") print(f"Query: {result.get('query_text', 'N/A')}") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") print(f"Matching indicators: {result.get('matching_indicators', [])}") print(f"Relevance score: {result.get('relevance_score', 0)}") print("-" * 40) else: print("No high relevance results found (4+ matching indicators)") print(f"\nüîã MICROGRID AND ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 55) if microgrid_results: print(f"Found {len(microgrid_results)} microgrid-related results:") for i, result in enumerate(microgrid_results[:5], 1): # Show top 5 print(f"\nMicrogrid Result {i}:") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')[:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") # Check for specific energy infrastructure details snippet_lower = result.get('snippet', '').lower() energy_details = [] if 'solar' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Solar PV') if 'combined heat and power' in snippet_lower or 'chp' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Combined Heat & Power (CHP)') if 'photovoltaic' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Photovoltaic systems') if 'renewable' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Renewable energy') if energy_details: print(f"Energy technologies mentioned: {', '.join(energy_details)}") print("-" * 30) else: print("No microgrid-related results found") print(f"\n‚ùå PLANNING REJECTION AND APPEAL ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) if planning_rejection_results: print(f"Found {len(planning_rejection_results)} planning rejection-related results:") for i, result in enumerate(planning_rejection_results[:3], 1): # Show top 3 print(f"\nRejection Result {i}:") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')[:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") print("-" * 30) else: print("No specific planning rejection results found") # Look for specific energy harvesting tiles or non-shortlisted proposals print(f"\nüîé SPECIFIC ENERGY HARVESTING TILES INVESTIGATION:") print("=" * 60) energy_tiles_results = [] non_shortlisted_results = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" if 'energy harvesting tiles' in title_snippet or 'harvesting tiles' in title_snippet: energy_tiles_results.append(result) if 'non-shortlisted' in title_snippet or 'not shortlisted' in title_snippet: non_shortlisted_results.append(result) print(f"Energy harvesting tiles results: {len(energy_tiles_results)}") print(f"Non-shortlisted proposal results: {len(non_shortlisted_results)}") if energy_tiles_results: print(f"\nüéØ ENERGY HARVESTING TILES FINDINGS:") for result in energy_tiles_results: print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") else: print("\n‚ö†Ô∏è NO SPECIFIC ENERGY HARVESTING TILES PROPOSALS FOUND") if non_shortlisted_results: print(f"\nüéØ NON-SHORTLISTED PROPOSAL FINDINGS:") for result in non_shortlisted_results: print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") else: print("\n‚ö†Ô∏è NO NON-SHORTLISTED ENERGY PROPOSALS FOUND") # Timeline analysis print(f"\nüìÖ TIMELINE ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 30) timeline_events = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" # Look for specific dates and events if 'july 2023' in title_snippet and 'rejected' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': 'July 2023', 'event': 'Planning application rejected by Newham Council', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if 'august 2024' in title_snippet and 'approved' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': 'August 2024', 'event': 'Expansion approved by government on appeal', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if '2022' in title_snippet and 'applied' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': '2022', 'event': 'Applied to Newham Council for planning changes', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if timeline_events: print(f"Key timeline events identified:") for event in timeline_events: print(f"‚Ä¢ {event['date']}: {event['event']}") print(f" Source: {event['source']}") # Final assessment and conclusions print(f"\nüìã COMPREHENSIVE ASSESSMENT AND CONCLUSIONS:") print("=" * 55) assessment = { 'airport_investigated': 'London City Airport (LCY)', 'energy_infrastructure_found': len(microgrid_results) > 0, 'energy_harvesting_tiles_found': len(energy_tiles_results) > 0, 'non_shortlisted_proposals_found': len(non_shortlisted_results) > 0, 'planning_rejections_found': len(planning_rejection_results) > 0, 'microgrid_projects_confirmed': len(microgrid_results) > 0, 'total_search_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_matches': len(high_relevance_results) } print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è LONDON CITY AIRPORT INVESTIGATION SUMMARY:") print(f"Airport: {assessment['airport_investigated']}") print(f"Total search results analyzed: {assessment['total_search_results']}") print(f"High relevance matches: {assessment['high_relevance_matches']}") print(f"\n‚úÖ CONFIRMED FINDINGS:") if assessment['energy_infrastructure_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Energy infrastructure projects: YES ({len(microgrid_results)} microgrid results)") print(f" - Microgrid development with solar PV and CHP confirmed") print(f" - Part of ¬£630 million City Airport Development Programme (CADP)") print(f" - UK Power Networks Services delivering the microgrid") else: print(f"‚Ä¢ Energy infrastructure projects: NO") if assessment['planning_rejections_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Planning application rejections: YES ({len(planning_rejection_results)} results)") print(f" - Initial rejection by Newham Council in July 2023") print(f" - Later approved by government on appeal in August 2024") else: print(f"‚Ä¢ Planning application rejections: NO") print(f"\n‚ùå NOT FOUND:") if not assessment['energy_harvesting_tiles_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals: NO") if not assessment['non_shortlisted_proposals_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Non-shortlisted energy harvesting proposals: NO") print(f"\nüéØ KEY CONCLUSION:") print(f"London City Airport has confirmed energy infrastructure projects (microgrid with") print(f"solar PV and CHP) that are APPROVED and under development, not rejected or") print(f"non-shortlisted. The planning applications were initially rejected by Newham") print(f"Council but later approved on appeal. However, NO EVIDENCE was found of specific") print(f"'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted.") print(f"\nüìÑ RECOMMENDATION:") print(f"Based on this comprehensive investigation, London City Airport does NOT appear") print(f"to be the correct airport for the original hypothesis about energy harvesting") print(f"tiles proposals that were non-shortlisted. The airport has active, approved") print(f"energy infrastructure projects, not rejected energy harvesting proposals.") # Save comprehensive summary summary_data = { 'investigation_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'airport_investigated': 'London City Airport', 'search_results_analyzed': len(all_results), 'assessment': assessment, 'key_findings': { 'microgrid_projects': len(microgrid_results), 'energy_harvesting_mentions': len(energy_harvesting_results), 'planning_rejections': len(planning_rejection_results), 'sustainability_initiatives': len(sustainability_results) }, 'conclusion': 'London City Airport has approved energy infrastructure (microgrid) projects, not rejected energy harvesting tiles proposals', 'recommendation': 'London City Airport is NOT the correct airport for the energy harvesting tiles hypothesis' } summary_file = 'workspace/london_city_airport_comprehensive_search_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("LONDON CITY AIRPORT ENERGY HARVESTING INVESTIGATION - COMPREHENSIVE SUMMARY\n") f.write("=" * 80 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Investigation Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Airport Investigated: London City Airport (LCY)\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {len(all_results)}\n") f.write(f"High Relevance Results: {len(high_relevance_results)}\n\n") f.write("KEY FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 20 + "\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Microgrid projects found: {len(microgrid_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Energy harvesting mentions: {len(energy_harvesting_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Planning rejections: {len(planning_rejection_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Sustainability initiatives: {len(sustainability_results)}\n\n") f.write("CONFIRMED ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Microgrid development project (approved and under development)\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Solar PV and Combined Heat & Power (CHP) systems\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Part of ¬£630 million City Airport Development Programme\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ UK Power Networks Services as delivery partner\n\n") f.write("PLANNING HISTORY:\n") f.write("-" * 17 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ July 2023: Initial rejection by Newham Council\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ August 2024: Approved by government on appeal\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Focus on passenger capacity expansion (6.5M to 9M)\n\n") f.write("NOT FOUND:\n") f.write("-" * 10 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Non-shortlisted energy harvesting submissions\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Rejected energy infrastructure proposals\n\n") f.write("CONCLUSION:\n") f.write("-" * 11 + "\n") f.write("London City Airport has APPROVED energy infrastructure projects\n") f.write("(microgrid with solar PV and CHP), not rejected energy harvesting\n") f.write("tiles proposals. This airport does NOT match the original hypothesis\n") f.write("about non-shortlisted energy harvesting infrastructure proposals.\n\n") f.write("RECOMMENDATION:\n") f.write("-" * 14 + "\n") f.write("London City Airport is NOT the correct airport for the energy\n") f.write("harvesting tiles hypothesis. Continue investigation with other\n") f.write("UK airports that may have had energy harvesting proposals that\n") f.write("were not shortlisted or rejected.\n") print(f"\nüìÅ FILES CREATED:") print(f"‚Ä¢ Search results: {results_file}") print(f"‚Ä¢ Comprehensive summary: {summary_file}") print(f"\n‚úÖ LONDON CITY AIRPORT INVESTIGATION COMPLETED") print(f"Result: NOT the correct airport for energy harvesting tiles hypothesis") else: print(f"Error: Results file {results_file} not found.") print("Available files in workspace:") if os.path.exists('workspace'): for file in os.listdir('workspace'): print(f" - {file}") else: print(" - No workspace directory found")

Initial rejection by Newham Council in July 2023 - Later approved by government on appeal in August 2024 ‚ùå NOT FOUND: ‚Ä¢ Specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals: NO ‚Ä¢ Non-shortlisted energy harvesting proposals: NO üéØ KEY CONCLUSION: London City Airport has confirmed energy infrastructure projects (microgrid with solar PV and CHP) that are APPROVED and under development, not rejected or non-shortlisted. The planning applications were initially rejected by Newham Council but later approved on appeal. However, NO EVIDENCE was found of specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted. üìÑ RECOMMENDATION: Based on this comprehensive investigation, London City Airport does NOT appear to be the correct airport for the original hypothesis about energy harvesting tiles proposals that were non-shortlisted. The airport has active, approved energy infrastructure projects, not rejected energy harvesting proposals. üìÅ FILES CREATED: ‚Ä¢ Search results: workspace_webshaper_41/london_city_airport_energy_harvesting_search_results_20250810_151618.json ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive summary: workspace_webshaper_41/london_city_airport_comprehensive_search_summary.txt ‚úÖ LONDON CITY AIRPORT INVESTIGATION COMPLETED Result: NOT the correct airport for energy harvesting tiles hypothesis

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution successful - Code ran without errors and completed a comprehensive investigation of London City Airport energy harvesting proposals. The analysis processed 173 search results and found: (1) London City Airport has confirmed energy infrastructure projects including an active microgrid development with solar PV and CHP systems as part of the ¬£630 million City Airport Development Programme, (2) Planning applications were initially rejected by Newham Council in July 2023 but later approved by government on appeal in August 2024, (3) No evidence found of specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals that were non-shortlisted. The investigation conclusively determined that London City Airport is NOT the correct airport for the original hypothesis about non-shortlisted energy harvesting infrastructure proposals, as the airport has approved and active energy projects rather than rejected ones. PLAN alignment: 100% complete - the investigation successfully assessed London City Airport and reached a definitive conclusion. The comprehensive analysis output should be saved to 'workspace/london_city_airport_comprehensive_search_summary.txt' as it contains valuable findings that rule out this airport and provides clear direction for future investigation of other UK airports that may have had energy harvesting proposals that were actually rejected or non-shortlisted.
Python Code python
import os import json from datetime import datetime # First, let's inspect the search results file to understand its structure results_file = 'workspace/london_city_airport_energy_harvesting_search_results_20250810_151618.json' if os.path.exists(results_file): print("Found London City Airport search results file. Inspecting structure...") print("=" * 70) # Load and inspect the file structure with open(results_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: data = json.load(f) print(f"File structure:") print(f"Keys in data: {list(data.keys())}") print(f"Search timestamp: {data.get('search_timestamp', 'N/A')}") print(f"Total queries: {data.get('total_queries', 'N/A')}") print(f"Total results: {data.get('total_results', 'N/A')}") if 'results' in data and len(data['results']) > 0: print(f"\nFirst result structure:") first_result = data['results'][0] print(f"Keys in result: {list(first_result.keys())}") print("\n" + "=" * 80) print("COMPREHENSIVE ANALYSIS: LONDON CITY AIRPORT ENERGY HARVESTING INVESTIGATION") print("=" * 80) # Analyze the search results comprehensively all_results = data.get('results', []) print(f"\nüìä SEARCH RESULTS OVERVIEW:") print(f"Total search queries executed: {data.get('total_queries', 0)}") print(f"Total results collected: {len(all_results)}") print(f"Search purpose: {data.get('search_purpose', 'N/A')}") # Categorize results by relevance and content type high_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 4] medium_relevance_results = [r for r in all_results if r.get('relevance_score', 0) >= 2 and r.get('relevance_score', 0) < 4] # Analyze energy infrastructure findings microgrid_results = [] energy_harvesting_results = [] planning_rejection_results = [] sustainability_results = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" if 'microgrid' in title_snippet: microgrid_results.append(result) if 'energy harvesting' in title_snippet or 'harvesting' in title_snippet: energy_harvesting_results.append(result) if 'rejected' in title_snippet and 'planning' in title_snippet: planning_rejection_results.append(result) if 'sustainability' in title_snippet or 'renewable energy' in title_snippet: sustainability_results.append(result) print(f"\nüîç CONTENT ANALYSIS BY CATEGORY:") print(f"High relevance results (4+ indicators): {len(high_relevance_results)}") print(f"Medium relevance results (2-3 indicators): {len(medium_relevance_results)}") print(f"Microgrid-related results: {len(microgrid_results)}") print(f"Energy harvesting-related results: {len(energy_harvesting_results)}") print(f"Planning rejection results: {len(planning_rejection_results)}") print(f"Sustainability-related results: {len(sustainability_results)}") # Detailed analysis of key findings print(f"\nüéØ HIGH RELEVANCE FINDINGS ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) if high_relevance_results: for i, result in enumerate(high_relevance_results, 1): print(f"\nHigh Relevance Result {i}:") print(f"Query: {result.get('query_text', 'N/A')}") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") print(f"Matching indicators: {result.get('matching_indicators', [])}") print(f"Relevance score: {result.get('relevance_score', 0)}") print("-" * 40) else: print("No high relevance results found (4+ matching indicators)") print(f"\nüîã MICROGRID AND ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 55) if microgrid_results: print(f"Found {len(microgrid_results)} microgrid-related results:") for i, result in enumerate(microgrid_results[:5], 1): # Show top 5 print(f"\nMicrogrid Result {i}:") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')[:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") # Check for specific energy infrastructure details snippet_lower = result.get('snippet', '').lower() energy_details = [] if 'solar' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Solar PV') if 'combined heat and power' in snippet_lower or 'chp' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Combined Heat & Power (CHP)') if 'photovoltaic' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Photovoltaic systems') if 'renewable' in snippet_lower: energy_details.append('Renewable energy') if energy_details: print(f"Energy technologies mentioned: {', '.join(energy_details)}") print("-" * 30) else: print("No microgrid-related results found") print(f"\n‚ùå PLANNING REJECTION AND APPEAL ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 50) if planning_rejection_results: print(f"Found {len(planning_rejection_results)} planning rejection-related results:") for i, result in enumerate(planning_rejection_results[:3], 1): # Show top 3 print(f"\nRejection Result {i}:") print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')[:200]}...") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") print("-" * 30) else: print("No specific planning rejection results found") # Look for specific energy harvesting tiles or non-shortlisted proposals print(f"\nüîé SPECIFIC ENERGY HARVESTING TILES INVESTIGATION:") print("=" * 60) energy_tiles_results = [] non_shortlisted_results = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" if 'energy harvesting tiles' in title_snippet or 'harvesting tiles' in title_snippet: energy_tiles_results.append(result) if 'non-shortlisted' in title_snippet or 'not shortlisted' in title_snippet: non_shortlisted_results.append(result) print(f"Energy harvesting tiles results: {len(energy_tiles_results)}") print(f"Non-shortlisted proposal results: {len(non_shortlisted_results)}") if energy_tiles_results: print(f"\nüéØ ENERGY HARVESTING TILES FINDINGS:") for result in energy_tiles_results: print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") else: print("\n‚ö†Ô∏è NO SPECIFIC ENERGY HARVESTING TILES PROPOSALS FOUND") if non_shortlisted_results: print(f"\nüéØ NON-SHORTLISTED PROPOSAL FINDINGS:") for result in non_shortlisted_results: print(f"Title: {result.get('title', 'N/A')}") print(f"Snippet: {result.get('snippet', 'N/A')}") print(f"Link: {result.get('link', 'N/A')}") else: print("\n‚ö†Ô∏è NO NON-SHORTLISTED ENERGY PROPOSALS FOUND") # Timeline analysis print(f"\nüìÖ TIMELINE ANALYSIS:") print("=" * 30) timeline_events = [] for result in all_results: title_snippet = f"{result.get('title', '').lower()} {result.get('snippet', '').lower()}" # Look for specific dates and events if 'july 2023' in title_snippet and 'rejected' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': 'July 2023', 'event': 'Planning application rejected by Newham Council', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if 'august 2024' in title_snippet and 'approved' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': 'August 2024', 'event': 'Expansion approved by government on appeal', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if '2022' in title_snippet and 'applied' in title_snippet: timeline_events.append({ 'date': '2022', 'event': 'Applied to Newham Council for planning changes', 'source': result.get('title', 'N/A') }) if timeline_events: print(f"Key timeline events identified:") for event in timeline_events: print(f"‚Ä¢ {event['date']}: {event['event']}") print(f" Source: {event['source']}") # Final assessment and conclusions print(f"\nüìã COMPREHENSIVE ASSESSMENT AND CONCLUSIONS:") print("=" * 55) assessment = { 'airport_investigated': 'London City Airport (LCY)', 'energy_infrastructure_found': len(microgrid_results) > 0, 'energy_harvesting_tiles_found': len(energy_tiles_results) > 0, 'non_shortlisted_proposals_found': len(non_shortlisted_results) > 0, 'planning_rejections_found': len(planning_rejection_results) > 0, 'microgrid_projects_confirmed': len(microgrid_results) > 0, 'total_search_results': len(all_results), 'high_relevance_matches': len(high_relevance_results) } print(f"\nüèõÔ∏è LONDON CITY AIRPORT INVESTIGATION SUMMARY:") print(f"Airport: {assessment['airport_investigated']}") print(f"Total search results analyzed: {assessment['total_search_results']}") print(f"High relevance matches: {assessment['high_relevance_matches']}") print(f"\n‚úÖ CONFIRMED FINDINGS:") if assessment['energy_infrastructure_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Energy infrastructure projects: YES ({len(microgrid_results)} microgrid results)") print(f" - Microgrid development with solar PV and CHP confirmed") print(f" - Part of ¬£630 million City Airport Development Programme (CADP)") print(f" - UK Power Networks Services delivering the microgrid") else: print(f"‚Ä¢ Energy infrastructure projects: NO") if assessment['planning_rejections_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Planning application rejections: YES ({len(planning_rejection_results)} results)") print(f" - Initial rejection by Newham Council in July 2023") print(f" - Later approved by government on appeal in August 2024") else: print(f"‚Ä¢ Planning application rejections: NO") print(f"\n‚ùå NOT FOUND:") if not assessment['energy_harvesting_tiles_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals: NO") if not assessment['non_shortlisted_proposals_found']: print(f"‚Ä¢ Non-shortlisted energy harvesting proposals: NO") print(f"\nüéØ KEY CONCLUSION:") print(f"London City Airport has confirmed energy infrastructure projects (microgrid with") print(f"solar PV and CHP) that are APPROVED and under development, not rejected or") print(f"non-shortlisted. The planning applications were initially rejected by Newham") print(f"Council but later approved on appeal. The airport has active, approved") print(f"energy infrastructure projects, not rejected energy harvesting proposals.") # Save comprehensive summary summary_data = { 'investigation_timestamp': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'airport_investigated': 'London City Airport', 'search_results_analyzed': len(all_results), 'assessment': assessment, 'key_findings': { 'microgrid_projects': len(microgrid_results), 'energy_harvesting_mentions': len(energy_harvesting_results), 'planning_rejections': len(planning_rejection_results), 'sustainability_initiatives': len(sustainability_results) }, 'conclusion': 'London City Airport has approved energy infrastructure (microgrid) projects, not rejected energy harvesting tiles proposals', 'recommendation': 'London City Airport is NOT the correct airport for the energy harvesting tiles hypothesis' } summary_file = 'workspace/london_city_airport_comprehensive_search_summary.txt' with open(summary_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write("LONDON CITY AIRPORT ENERGY HARVESTING INVESTIGATION - COMPREHENSIVE SUMMARY\n") f.write("=" * 80 + "\n\n") f.write(f"Investigation Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n") f.write(f"Airport Investigated: London City Airport (LCY)\n") f.write(f"Total Search Results: {len(all_results)}\n") f.write(f"High Relevance Results: {len(high_relevance_results)}\n\n") f.write("KEY FINDINGS:\n") f.write("-" * 20 + "\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Microgrid projects found: {len(microgrid_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Energy harvesting mentions: {len(energy_harvesting_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Planning rejections: {len(planning_rejection_results)}\n") f.write(f"‚Ä¢ Sustainability initiatives: {len(sustainability_results)}\n\n") f.write("CONFIRMED ENERGY INFRASTRUCTURE:\n") f.write("-" * 35 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Microgrid development project (approved and under development)\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Solar PV and Combined Heat & Power (CHP) systems\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Part of ¬£630 million City Airport Development Programme\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ UK Power Networks Services as delivery partner\n\n") f.write("PLANNING HISTORY:\n") f.write("-" * 17 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ July 2023: Initial rejection by Newham Council\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ August 2024: Approved by government on appeal\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Focus on passenger capacity expansion (6.5M to 9M)\n\n") f.write("NOT FOUND:\n") f.write("-" * 10 + "\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Specific 'energy harvesting tiles' proposals\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Non-shortlisted energy harvesting submissions\n") f.write("‚Ä¢ Rejected energy infrastructure proposals\n\n") f.write("CONCLUSION:\n") f.write("-" * 11 + "\n") f.write("London City Airport has APPROVED energy infrastructure projects\n") f.write("(microgrid with solar PV and CHP), not rejected energy harvesting\n") f.write("tiles proposals. Continue investigation with other\n") f.write("UK airports that may have had energy harvesting proposals that\n") f.write("were not shortlisted or rejected.\n") print(f"\nüìÅ FILES CREATED:") print(f"‚Ä¢ Search results: {results_file}") print(f"‚Ä¢ Comprehensive summary: {summary_file}") print(f"\n‚úÖ LONDON CITY AIRPORT INVESTIGATION COMPLETED") print(f"Result: NOT the correct airport for energy harvesting tiles hypothesis") else: print(f"Error: Results file {results_file} not found.") print("Available files in workspace:") if os.path.exists('workspace'): for file in os.listdir('workspace'): print(f" - {file}") else: print(" - No workspace directory found")

Plan Content:
Search for Gatwick Airport's energy harvesting floor tiles installations and expansion proposals that included energy harvesting infrastructure. Focus on finding evidence of Gatwick having energy harvesting floor technology and subsequent expansion proposals that were submitted to planning authorities and received non-shortlisted or rejected assessments.
